metadata.title: CVE-2019-3558 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Python Facebook Thrift servers would not error upon receiving messages withcontainers of fields of unknown type. As a result, malicious clients couldsend short messages which would take a long time for the server to parse,potentially leading to denial of service. This issue affects FacebookThrift prior to v2019.02.18.00.

criterions.comment: hhvm package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
